room_title: Escape room "The Mystery Room" by House of Clues in Houston
review: Spent my birthday with family and friends in the mystery room. Very challenging, there were 8 of us and everyone worked hard to solve the clues. The room was a little small but ok for 8 people. We had one hour to solve all the clues and unlock all the cases that contained the keys to open the door. We finished in 34 minutes. Great fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Mystery Room" by House of Clues in Houston
review: First off, the owner was incredibly sweet! The entire staff greeted us with a warm welcome! We did the Mystery room and it was so fun! The first 30 minutes we literally thought we werenâ€™t even going to find one key! But once you find your first key - the confidence builds! With only 13 mins left on the clock, we had found all three keys and escaped!

room_title: Escape room "The Mystery Room" by House of Clues in Houston
review: Good family fun! Will be back for more!Can't wait!

room_title: Escape room "The Mystery Room" by House of Clues in Houston
review: Had a blast. So close, yet so far. If you want something different to do, this is it.
